headline: PNC Multifamily Capital Announces 100th Affordable Housing Fund; Driving Nationwide Impact
summary: PNC Bank, N.A., a tax credit syndication leader, today announced the closing of Low-Income Housing Tax Credit (LIHTC) Fund 100, which is investing more than $175 million in the development and rehabilitation of affordable rental housing across the U.S. The fund includes investments from PNC and six other financial services and insurance companies.
